name: testshop-playwright-template
description: Standalone Playwright E2E Test Suite for TestShop

scripts.check:e2e: npm run report:history && npm run test:e2e || true && npm run report:show
scripts.check:docker: npm run report:history && npm run test:docker || true && npm run report:show
scripts.check:release: npm run report:history && npm run test:release || true && npm run report:show
scripts.report:history: mkdir -p reporting/allure-results/history && cp -r reporting/allure-report/history/* reporting/allure-results/history/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.report:show: npm run report:generate && npm run report:open
